concept.title: Metric Alerts
concept.shortdesc: Metric alerts are alerts based on pipeline and stage statistics, such as a high rate of error records or a batch of records taking too long to process.

conbody.p: metric alertsoverviewmonitoringmetric alertsMetric alerts display in the console in Monitor mode. You can also configure a metric alert to send email to all email addresses associated with the pipeline.
You can configure metric alerts when you configure the pipeline or after you start the pipeline. The metric alert takes effect after you enable the alert.
